Text.val: -- Check if there is anything left to do (TINV row present for ADMN/CLNT)
-- 1. Test first if there are dummy draft bookings which should not be
-- 2. Book off remaining invoices --> (performed in single transaction)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/TINV where TINV_ADMNO = :2 and TINV_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Delete remaining TINV rows where TINV_AACTUALI = 0
-- Store BATCH if not already exist
Update last line BTCP and use this updated number to keep BTCP in sync
transaction on DEBC level so we may have a restart with a partial batch

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 for fetch only
